Metron
  • Native Extensions
  • Object/Class Methods
  • Namespaced Components/Methods

Metron JavaScript Convenience Library

String Extensions

String.lower() 
          
          var name = "JOHN";
          name.lower();
          console.log(name);
String.upper() 
          
          var name = "john";
          name.upper();
          console.log(name);
String.trim() 
          
          var name = "   John   ";
          name.trim();
          console.log(name);
